name: Word Conflux
description:
Welcome to the world of words! Word Conflux is a captivating puzzle game that tests your linguistic skills and offers a fun way to spend your free time. The goal of the game is to find the hidden words in a grid of letters by connecting the letters in the correct order to form the right words.

Word Conflux comes with a variety of difficulty levels, starting with easy levels and progressing gradually towards more advanced levels. Each level is carefully designed to challenge you and offer unique challenges.

Features:

A variety of difficulty levels to test your linguistic skills.

The ability to use hints to help you when you're stuck.

A relaxed gameplay mode that allows you to spend your free time in a fun way.

Periodic updates with new levels and new challenges.

Instructions for use:

Select a difficulty level.

Find all the hidden words in the grid of letters by connecting the letters in the correct order.

Use hints to help you when you're stuck.

Complete all the levels to advance in the game.
